dc_title_s: Ipsos Canada RBC Housing Study, Winter 2005
dc_description_s: The Ipsos Canada Winter 2005 RBC Housing Study analyzes home ownership trends in Canada. Participants to the survey reveal key information on current home ownership status and short-term intentions, mortgage financing, values of property, as well as Canadians' credit knowledge. The study consists of statistical tables extracted from the original data, as well as reports and presentations. This study has a sample of 2,001 respondents.
